SMB 1 (Uncompressed) Replay Format

Notes

  • Thanks to PistonMiner for figuring out he uncompressed format: https://github.com/PistonMiner/smb-tools
  • The initial gamecube header is being ignored here. Compressed replay data begins at 0x2090 in a .gci
  • Data after the header is separated into 24 blocks of size 0xF00. One byte from each block is used per frame.

Sections

  • Header Section (Offset 0x0)
  • Frame Data (Each byte is in a serpate block of length 0xF00. One byte in each block is used per frame)

Flags

  • 4 byte float
  • 1 byte
  • 4 byte integer
  • 2 byte short
  • 1 byte
  • Unknown

Header Section (Offset 0x0)

Length: 0x44/68

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x22Flags
0x220x11Level Id
0x330x11Level Difficulty
0x440x11Level Floor
0x550x11unk_05
0x660x22unk_06
0x880x44unk_08
0xC120x44unk_0c
0x10160x44Score Points
0x14200x44unk_14
0x18240x22Level Max Time (ex: 60 seconds in frames)
0x1A260x22Replay Total Time
0x1C280x22Score Time Remaining
0x1E300x22unk_1E
0x20320x44Time With Score
0x24360x44unk_24
0x28400x44unk_28
0x2C440x44unk_2C
0x30480x44unk_30
0x34520x44unk_34
0x38560x44Start Position X
0x3C600x44Start Position Y
0x40640x44Start Position Z

Frame Data (Each byte is in a serpate block of length 0xF00. One byte in each block is used per frame)

Length: 0x18/24

Relative Offset (Hex)Relative Offset (Dec)Length (Hex)Length (Dec)FlagsInfoLink
0x000x11Delta X from last frame (lower byte) (Divide combined value by 16,383 to get the true float value)
0x110x11Delta X from last frame (upper byte) (Divide combined value by 16,383 to get the true float value)
0x220x11Delta Y from last frame (lower byte) (Divide combined value by 16,383 to get the true float value)
0x330x11Delta Y from last frame (upper byte) (Divide combined value by 16,383 to get the true float value)
0x440x11Delta Z from last frame (lower byte) (Divide combined value by 16,383 to get the true float value)
0x550x11Delta Z from last frame (upper byte) (Divide combined value by 16,383 to get the true float value)
0x660x11Ball rotation X (lower byte)
0x770x11Ball rotation X (upper byte)
0x880x11Ball rotation Y (lower byte)
0x990x11Ball rotation Y (upper byte)
0xA100x11Ball rotation Z (lower byte)
0xB110x11Ball rotation Z (upper byte)
0xC120x11Spark X direction (Multiply by 256 to get the true float value)
0xD130x11Spark Y direction (Multiply by 256 to get the true float value)
0xE140x11Spark Z direction (Multiply by 256 to get the true float value)
0xF150x11spark intensity (Divide by 127 to get the true float value)
0x10160x11Flags (lower byte)
0x11170x11Flags (lower-middle byte)
0x12180x11Flags (upper-middle byte)
0x13190x11Flags (upper byte)
0x14200x11Stage tilt X (lower byte)
0x15210x11Stage tilt X (upper byte)
0x16220x11Stage tilt Y (lower byte)
0x17230x11Stage tilt Y (upper byte)
